testimonials.text: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.

That Furkan Dogan must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet (Just kidding i am hired). Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
